thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Babba

author: Babba
title: Babba
text: I am very satisfied with customer / provider service. Their products are good quality. I feel that my order will be sent with confidence. Shipping is done ✅ quickly from source and arrives in a timely period. Had an issue with tablet not arriving in Ukraine and was not aware of insurance feature for coverage, and was compensated with a resend. I was impressed. Very convenient for me to send gifts to relatives in Ukraine from me in Canada via Banggood. Very happy with all. Recommend high, customer service excellent as is web chat. 5* company.
